title.rendered: Board of Education Meeting on February 15

content.rendered:
The Board of Education will hold a regular meeting on February 15 at 7 p.m.    The meeting will be held at Saratoga Springs High School. Watch the meeting through youtube.

6:15 p.m. – Special  BOE meeting to review board goals
6:50 p.m. – Public hearing to review a BOE policy 
7:00 p.m. –  Regular meeting

Meeting agendas and minutes are posted through BoardDocs.
